summary: Frontend testing of desktop header, profile page, and badge celebration features. Fixed critical bug in homepage credit balance API endpoint.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified and working. One bug fixed during testing.

4_credit_balance_api_endpoint.details: API endpoint /api/boost/credits/balance verified. Old endpoint /api/credits/balance returns 404 (correct behavior). Fixed bug in homepage that was calling wrong endpoint.

5_badge_celebration_modal.details: BadgeCelebrationModal component exists and is correctly configured. Context provider (BadgeCelebrationProvider) wraps entire app in _layout.tsx. Trigger logic verified in my-listings.tsx (mark-sold) and post/index.tsx (listing creation).

bug1.issue: Homepage fetchCreditBalance was using EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL which doesn't exist, causing credit balance to always show '...'
bug1.fix: Changed to EXPO_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL to match the correct environment variable

test_methodology: Playwright browser automation - logged in with test user and verified header elements on Homepage and Profile page in desktop view (width 1920px). Verified API endpoints using curl. Code review of badge celebration context and modal components.
